intro.heading: üá¨üáß About this project
intro.paragraph1: This is a small personal demo built during the recent floods in Vietnam.
intro.paragraph2: It is not an official system, does not provide fully real-time or guaranteed accurate data, and must not replace government warnings or professional rescue operations.
intro.paragraph3: Safe Road helps users assess flood risks and find safer routes during storms by combining official NCHMF data with AI analysis.

floodRisk.title: üìç Point-based risk assessment
floodRisk.point1: Integrates real-time data from ~60-90 NCHMF monitoring stations with expert assessments on flash flood and landslide risks
floodRisk.point2: AI analysis combines current rainfall, 6-hour forecast, and terrain data. Adjusts for vehicle type (car, motorcycle, pedestrian)
floodRisk.point3: Shows data confidence level so users can assess information quality

safeRoute.title: üõ£Ô∏è Route safety analysis
safeRoute.point1: Identifies dangerous segments along the route based on multiple checkpoint analysis
safeRoute.point2: Finds nearby NCHMF monitoring stations near start point, destination, and dangerous segments
safeRoute.point3: AI suggestions based on real conditions from expert data with visual warnings displayed on map

disclaimer.paragraph1: I'm just a person with an idea, not a professional engineer or organization.
disclaimer.paragraph2: Want to help improve this tool? Fork/contribute at:

donation.heading: How to donate
donation.paragraph1: Please support flood victims through the official Central Relief Fund of the Vietnam Fatherland Front. Your contributions will reach those who need it most.
donation.paragraph2: Below are the official bank accounts for donations:

usdSection.heading: USD Donation Accounts (for international donors)
usdSection.intro: Thank you, overseas friends, for your contribution! For international donors who wish to transfer in USD, here are the two official accounts:

account1.bank: VietinBank (Vietnam Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Industry and Trade)
account1.accountName: Account Name: Central Committee for Disaster Relief
account1.branch: Bank Branch: VietinBank ‚Äì Dong Ha Noi Branch

account2.bank: Vietcombank (Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Foreign Trade of Vietnam)
account2.accountName: Account Name: Vietnam Fatherland Front ‚Äì Central Relief Fund

usdSection.thankYou: Thank you for your generous support!
